@SenTedBuddNC @SenatorRisch Negotiation with Iran is not an option—not now, not ever, and not under any circumstances. Decades of dialogue have led only to more repression, more executions, and more innocent lives lost, proving that this regime uses talks as a tactic to buy time and evade accountability.

@SenTedBuddNC @SenatorRisch The Islamic Republic spent decades funding and arming America’s enemies.
Nearly 2,000 U.S. troops were killed as a result.
The richest terrorist network in history—built on Iran’s oil and gold.
That’s a betrayal of American blood.
And a betrayal of the Iranian people as well. https://t.co/5oyFyX2Lbi
